rulesStrings.li: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef] being reintegrated in a clonebay
image->[PAWN_nameFull] rising out of the clonebay [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] being reintegrated in the clonebay [circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [PAWN_objective].
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is incredibly confused as [PAWN_pronoun] mind reintegrates.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] can barely figure out what is going on.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] make a few jumbled words of speech.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches with awe of what's going on.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches on with a look of fear.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches on with a look of wonder.
